Html:
Hi,

I'm looking to use rawr for my disc priest however when opening the program it sais that it is for holy priests. Can rawr be used for disc priests and is it accurate when doing so? Also when I want to use the optimize feature should I base it on the overall rating, hps burst rating, or hps sustained rating?

Thanks

It should have been renamed a long time ago to "HealingPriest", as it covers both Discipline and Holy.

 

When optimizing, make sure you pick the role which closest resembles what you are actually doing. Also make sure you set all options to be as close as possible to the situation you wish to optimize for. Then you should optimize for overall rating.

 

Hope this helps.

Thanks that helps alot. I have one more question about which role to pick. If I'm not necessarily sure if I'm going to be healing either tank or raid which role do you think would be more accurate for me to use?
Normally the raid role is harder on mana, so you might want to try to go with that.
